basic_info.title: Fix GitHub Actions markdown link checking failures

comments.body:
### ğŸ¤– Devin AI Engineer

I'll be helping with this pull request! Here's what you should know:

âœ… I will automatically:
- Address comments on this PR. Add '(aside)' to your comment to have me ignore it.
- Look at CI failures and help fix them

Note: I can only respond to comments from users who have write access to this repository.

âš™ï¸ Control Options:
- [ ] Disable automatic comment and CI monitoring

performed_via_github_app.name: Devin.ai Integration
performed_via_github_app.description: This Github App integration allows Devin (devin.ai) to have limited authenticated access to your organization's code repositories.

commit.message:
Fix broken markdown links

- Create missing 23_ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ï¼’çµŒæ¸ˆè²¡æ”¿.md file referenced in policy index
- Fix malformed GitHub URLs in 25_ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ï¼’_ãƒ‡ã‚¸ã‚¿ãƒ«æ°‘ä¸»ä¸»ç¾©.md
- Add missing closing parenthesis in digital democracy file

Resolves GitHub Actions Linkspector failures in PR #954

Co-Authored-By: tokshibata@gmail.com <tokshibata@gmail.com>

Fix remaining markdown link issues

- Convert GitHub URLs to proper markdown links in digital democracy file
- Correct header anchor formats in economic policy file to match policy index expectations
- Remove punctuation from headers to match expected anchor link format

Co-Authored-By: tokshibata@gmail.com <tokshibata@gmail.com>
